name: World
fact: There are 195 countries in the world today, including 193 United Nations member states and 2 observer states.

name: India
fact: India is the second-most populous country in the world and has 22 officially recognized languages.

name: United States
fact: The U.S. is the third-largest country in both population and area.

name: China
fact: China is home to the Great Wall, one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

name: France
fact: Paris is known as the 'City of Light' and is famous for its art, cuisine, and landmarks.

name: Australia
fact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent, known for its unique wildlife like kangaroos and koalas.

name: Japan
fact: Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world, with over 37 million residents.

name: Brazil
fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon rainforest, which produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: South Africa
fact: South Africa has three capitals, each serving a different purpose in the government.
